text.autoconfig.taleofkingdoms.title: Tale af Kongeriger konfiguration
category.taleofkingdoms.keys: Tale of Kingdoms: A new Conquest
menu.taleofkingdoms.guild_master.name: Laugs Mester
menu.taleofkingdoms.blacksmith.name: Grovsmed
menu.taleofkingdoms.banker.name: Bankmand
menu.taleofkingdoms.banker.total_money: Samlet penge du har: %d Guld Mønter
menu.taleofkingdoms.banker.total_money_b: Samplet penge i banken: %d Guld Mønter
menu.taleofkingdoms.foodshop.name: Madbod
menu.taleofkingdoms.startconquest.name: Start Erobringen
menu.taleofkingdoms.startconquest.exit: Tryk på ESC for manuelt at generere laugsen andre steder.
menu.taleofkingdoms.startconquest.closed: Start erobring menuen blev lukket. Tryk på %s for at åbne den igen.
menu.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.no_rooms: Husholderske: Der er tilsyneladende ingen værelser til rådighed på dette tidspunkt.
menu.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.not_enough: House Keeper: You don't have enough coins to stay here!
menu.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.wait_succe: House Keeper: Oh, how the time flies! You're a great conversation.
menu.taleofkingdoms.foreman.buy_worker_c: En arbejder koster 1500 Guld at købe.
menu.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.build_co: Er du sikker på, at du vil bygge her?
menu.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.destroy: ADVARSEL: Når du bygger vil det ødelægge området omkring det for at gøre plads.
menu.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.destroy_: ANY BLOCKS, INCLUDING CHESTS, WILL BE REMOVED WITHOUT DROPPING ITEMS!
menu.taleofkingdoms.warden.recruit.knigh: Recruit a knight to your kingdom.
menu.taleofkingdoms.warden.recruit.arche: Recruit an archer to your kingdom.
menu.taleofkingdoms.warden.buy_cost: Recruiting an archer or knight costs 1000 gold.
menu.taleofkingdoms.warden.recall: Recall all defenders to the barracks.
entity.foreman.need_resources: Værkfører: Har du brug for ressourcer herre?
entity.foreman.collect_resources_empty: Værkfører: Kom tilbage igen senere, når vi har nogle ressourcer!
entity.foreman.buy_worker: Værkfører: De vil begynde at arbejde med det samme!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.farmer.take_b: Landmand: Her har du noget brød!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.farmer.got_br: Landmand: Du har fået dit brød for nu!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.c: Laugs Mester: Du er en af os nu min ven. Dræb monstre og du vil snart være værdig til din titel.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.w: Laugs Mester: Velkommen til ordenen, helt.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.n: Laugs Mester: Du har ingen jægere.
Guild Master: Repairing the guild is no cheap matter! Come back when you have 64 logs and 3000 coins.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.h: Laugs Master: Min lærlinge! laugsen er under angreb, og jeg er kommet for at bede om din hjælp. Vi må skynde os tilbage til laugsen!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.s: Laugs Master: Hold dig tæt og jeg vil helbrede dig.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.r: Laugs Master: Vi gjorde det bedste, vi kunne. Nu skal vi genopbygge laugsen og samle 64 træ, mens resten gør nogle oprydning og konstruktion!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.k: Laugs Master: Lad os tage disse bastards ned. Der er stadig nogle tilbage!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.t: Laugs Master: Tak helt. Du har bevist dig selv en værdig leder! Men, din søgen efter kongerige er ikke overstået. Jeg vil være tilbage i laugsen, og De kan fortsætte dette gode fremskridt.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmember.f: Laugs medlem: For fanden de refikser.
Guild Member: Greetings! You seem like a tough fighter... Give me a wooden sword and let us have a sparring match!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmember.g: You are a good fighter my friend, I will let the guildmaster know of your strength!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.hunter.bow: Hunter: I shall use my bow.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.hunter.sword: Hunter: I shall use my sword.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.hunter.serve: Hunter: I will serve you, my liege!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.res: House Keeper: Would you like to have some rest, sir?
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.lea: House Keeper: Have a nice day.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.shop.close: Shop Keeper: Thank you! Come back again!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.bank.open: Banker: I will keep your gold safe!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.bank.no_spend: Banker: I promise I won't spend this.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.bank.there: Banker: There you go sir, that should be all the money you've requested.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.bank.zero: Banker: You have no money! Go fight mobs to earn some gold.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.m: City Builder: My king you are still not worthy of creating a kingdom. The Guild Master will prepare you!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.b: City Builder: Let us build your city my liege! Lead the way!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.d: City Builder: We must keep distance from the guild sir! (%d/%d)
entity_type.taleokfingdoms.citybuilder.g: City Builder: Just keep on building.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.warden.gui.op: Warden: The guild's warden, at your service.
menu.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
generic.taleofkingdoms.need_contract: House Keeper: You need a contract for that! Go and visit the Guild Master upstairs!
generic.taleofkingdoms.serve: I will serve you, my liege!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.lone.help: Survivor: I am greatly lost, my king, I survived the attack but many of our villages burned down. There are still survivors left, hurry and rescue them!
generic.taleofkingdoms.darkness:
The Great Tides of Darkness have come.
The Reficules have ravaged the Kingdom's land, and it is you that must save what is left.
You are the last heir to the throne - the only hope for the overworld.
Build your forces and vanquish evil.
generic.taleofkingdoms.hero: Your adventure starts here, hero. The Guild will prepare you...
Thank the heavens! Our village was attacked by the reficules. Please, lead me back to the guild.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.lone.thank: My king! Thank you for saving them! I will let the §eGuild Master§r know of your efforts.
Lost Villager: My king! Thank you for saving me.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.c: Guild Master: We await your participation, hero.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.villager.ask_: Villager: My king! Do you need a worker? Give me an axe and a pickaxe and I will work for you.
